zeusGym.shortDesc: Demo website for a fake gym with a routine builder functionality
zeusGym.longDesc: Full demo website for a fake gym, with a built in functionality to build a custom workout routine. In order to build a custom routine, the user has the option to choose from thousands of exercises, that are fetched and searched for in a searchbar that has search filter functionality.

appChat.longDesc: Simple chatting application. In this site you can register an account and chat with anyone that is also registered.

webCrawler.longDesc: This program allows you to see all the inner links of a website, printing them in the console.

skills.howToUse: Click and drag or scroll to see all skills

about.desc: Hi, my name is Valentino Valle and I'm a front-end web developer and computer engineering student from Argentina. I'm also passionate about music, video games, and languages. I'm always interested in learning new technologies and concepts code related.
